amendment.description: To modify authorities relating to the composition and appointment of members of the United States Marine Band and the United States Marine Drum and Bugle Corps.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4350 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4350 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6117-6122; text: CR S6119) To modify authorities relating to the composition and appointment of members of the United States Marine Band and the United States Marine Drum and Bugle Corps.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4350 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4350 proposed by Senator Warner.
